creator: Serhii Korovayny
caption: Resque workers loading Valeriy, 72, to the evacuation train in Pokrovsk, Donetsk region. Today, he and his family were evacuated from their home in Chasiv Yar. As Russian troops advancing in Bakhmut area, this city becomes dangerous to stay in, as frequent rusisan shelling can ruin civillian houses, wound or even kill them anytime.
